description: to maintain and repair building control systems and sensors with several buildings.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Title (English)**: W6895-240012-B Gas Sensors and Building Automation Systems Maintenance
* **Title (French)**: W6895-240012-B Maintenance des capteurs de gaz et des systèmes d'automatisation des bâtiments
* **Reference Number**: WS4483380552-Doc4556779281
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4483380552
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-24T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-04-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2029-04-30

## Notice Type and Procurement Details

* **Notice Type (English)**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Notice Type (French)**: Demande d’offre à commandes
* **Procurement Method (English)**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement Method (French)**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Selection Criteria (English)**: Lowest Price
* **Selection Criteria (French)**: Prix le plus bas

## Contractual Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Cold Lake
* **Contract Duration**: 3 years, with potential for 2 additional 1-year periods

## Bidding Requirements

* Interested bidders are invited to submit their proposals in accordance with the tender notice
* Debriefing or feedback sessions will be provided to bidders who request them
* All responses must be submitted by the tender closing date and time to be considered

## Point of Contact

* **Contact Name**: Ben Wong (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: ben.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: Not available
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19530169?extsite=MTk1MzAxNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
